Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.renderer

Class MoveAnimation

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.renderer.Animation
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.renderer.MoveAnimation
Direct Known Subclasses:
WalkAnimation
public class MoveAnimation extends Animation
Class to represent an animation that performs a move from one tile to another.

  • Constructor Details

    • MoveAnimation

      public MoveAnimation(Point startTile, Direction direction, int length, Entity entity)
      Creates a new move Animation.
      Parameters:
      startTile - the tile to start the animation on
      direction - the tile to move the entity to
      length - the length of the animation in ticks
      entity - the entity to move

    • MoveAnimation

      public MoveAnimation(Point startTile, Point endTile, int length, Entity entity)
      Alternative constructor that has start and end tiles rather than a direction.
      Parameters:
      startTile - the tile to start the animation in
      endTile - the tile to end the animation in
      length - the length of the animation in ticks
      entity - the entity to animate
